Uses of Class
org.jgrapes.io.util.ByteBufferOutputStream

Packages that use ByteBufferOutputStream
Package
Description
org.jgrapes.io.util
Utility classes, mainly for adapted buffers to specific needs.

  • Uses of ByteBufferOutputStream in org.jgrapes.io.util

    Methods in org.jgrapes.io.util that return ByteBufferOutputStream
    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    ByteBufferOutputStream
    ByteBufferOutputStream.sendInputEvents()
    Causes the data to be fired as Input events rather than the usual Output events.
    ByteBufferOutputStream
    ByteBufferOutputStream.suppressClose()
    Suppresses sending of a close event when the stream is closed.
    ByteBufferOutputStream
    ByteBufferOutputStream.suppressEndOfRecord()
    Suppresses setting the end of record flag when the stream is flushed or closed.
